section.name: HST Configuration in web.xml
section.p: This example web.xml shows the installation of the hst.properties, of one 'preview' web filter and a servlet for binaries.
section.source:
<!-- General configuration --> <context-param> <description>Comma separated list of configuration files.</description> <param-name>configurationFiles</param-name> <param-value>/WEB-INF/hst.properties</param-value> </context-param> <listener> <listener-class>org.hippoecm.hst.core.HSTConfiguration</listener-class> </listener>
<!-- Example of one HST filter pointing to a preview path in the repository. --> <filter> <filter-name>previewContext</filter-name> <filter-class>org.hippoecm.hst.core.URLMappingContextFilter</filter-class> <!-- to omit URL mapping functionality use: <filter-class>org.hippoecm.hst.core.ContextFilter</filter-class> --> <init-param> <description> The name of the context object created in the request scope. Defaults to 'context'. </description> <param-name>attributeName</param-name> <param-value>context</param-value> </init-param> <init-param> <description> The part of the url this filter matches to, so must match the actual url-pattern of the filter-mapping below. </description> <param-name>urlBasePath</param-name> <param-value>/preview</param-value> </init-param> <init-param> <description> The repository base path to bind the context to. Defaults to the same value as urlBasePath. </description> <param-name>repositoryBaseLocation</param-name> <param-value>/preview</param-value> </init-param> </filter>
<filter-mapping> <filter-name>previewContext</filter-name> <url-pattern>/preview/*</url-pattern> <dispatcher>REQUEST</dispatcher> </filter-mapping>
<!-- Installation of a servlet serving binaries from repository. --> <servlet> <servlet-name>BinariesServlet</servlet-name> <servlet-class>org.hippoecm.hst.core.BinariesServlet</servlet-class> </servlet>
<servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>BinariesServlet</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/binaries/*</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping>
